channel.title: CVE Feed for J.N. Breetvelt a.k.a. OpaJaap -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-37416|2024-08-02T03:57:39.082Z -- j.n.%20breetvelt%20a.k.a.%20opajaap -- wp%20photo%20album%20plus
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in J.N. Breetvelt a.K.A. OpaJaap WP Photo Album Plus allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Photo Album Plus: from n/a through 8.8.00.002.
